sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AJAXHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>AJAX helper functions
- create the item xml for a GlideRecord</description>
        <name>AJAXHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.include("PrototypeServer");

var AJAXHelper = Class.create();

AJAXHelper.prototype = {
  initialize: function() {
  },
  
  // create xml item elements for each row in the GlideRecord
  // an attribute for each element in the fields array
  createItemXML: function(gr, element, fields) {
     this.createItemXML(gr, element, fields, false);  
  },

  createItemXML0: function(gr, element, fields, sandbox) {
    var doc = element.getOwnerDocument();
    while (gr.next()) {
        var item = doc.createElement('item'); 
        element.appendChild(item);
        for (var i = 0; i < fields.length; i++) {
          var name = fields[i];
          if (sandbox && !gr[name].canRead())
              continue;

          item.setAttribute(name, gr.getValue(name));
        }
    }
  }
};
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2007-04-21 14:03:25</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>14744cdc7f00000101703ff18b07f769</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AJAXHelper</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="UI Pages (define HTML pages and their processing)" source="com.glide.ui_page">fd2338603c31311068bcf327dfe37f15</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_14744cdc7f00000101703ff18b07f769</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>pat.casey</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2009-11-09 21:34:29</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
